Package cycling

Class Rider

java.lang.Object
cycling.Rider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Rider extends Object implements Serializable
Rider class. This class manages all the rider's within CyclingPortal and the results that the rider's get from each stage as well as the mountain points that they collect from each checkpoint they score during a race.
See Also:

    • addStageResults

      public void addStageResults(int stageId, int result)
      Method that stores the ID of a stage and the result that the rider got from racing in the stage inside the HashMap.
      Parameters:
      stageId - The ID of the stage that the rider raced in.
      result - The result the rider got from the race.

    • addCheckpointResults

      public void addCheckpointResults(int checkpointId, int result)
      Method that stores the ID of the checkpoint and the mountain points that the rider accumulated from racing in the checkpoint inside the HashMap.
      Parameters:
      checkpointId - The ID of the checkpoint that the rider raced in.
      result - The amount of mountain points accumulated from the checkpoint.

    • addCheckpointTimes

      public void addCheckpointTimes(int stageId, LocalTime[] checkpointTimes)
      Method that stores the ID of the stage and all the times that the rider got from all of the checkpoints in the stage inside the HashMap.
      Parameters:
      stageId - The ID of the stage that the rider raced in.
      checkpointTimes - An array of the times that the rider scored for each of the checkpoints.

    • deleteStageResults

      public void deleteStageResults(int stageId)
      Method that deletes the stage results that the rider achieved from the HashMap.
      Parameters:
      stageId - The ID of the stage that the rider participated in.

    • deleteCheckpointResults

      public void deleteCheckpointResults(int checkpointId)
      Methods that deletes the checkpoint results that the rider achieved from the HashMap.
      Parameters:
      checkpointId - The ID of the checkpoint that the rider participated in.

    • deleteCheckpointTimes

      public void deleteCheckpointTimes(int stageId)
      Method that deletes the checkpoint times that the rider scored from the HashMap.
      Parameters:
      stageId - The ID of the stage that the rider participated in.

    • calculateRidersTotalElapsedTime

      public LocalTime calculateRidersTotalElapsedTime(int stageId)
      Method that calculates the rider's total elapsed time from the stage enquired by finding the sum of all the checkpoint times.
      Parameters:
      stageId - The stage ID that the rider participated in.
      Returns:
      The total time it took for the rider to complete the stage.

    • calculateRidersTotalMountainPoints

      public int calculateRidersTotalMountainPoints()
      Method that calculates the total amount of mountain points that the rider gains from the all the checkpoints within the race.
      Parameters:
      checkpointIds - An array of all the checkpoint IDs within the race.
      Returns:
      The total amount of mountain points that the rider has accumulated from the race.

    • atomicReset

      public static void atomicReset()
      Method that resets the ID counter. The ID counter creates a new ID for every single new rider that is created.
